ground_truth: The light beams from a torch held aloft by a statuesque woman wearing Grecian style robes, and the logo fades away to black. A few flakes of snow gently flutter out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights atop an establishment advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub, while a few people wander down the street, clutching gifts for their loved ones. Inside the pub, various groups of friends, families, and work colleagues have gathered together for a festive drink and to exchange presents. They chat and laugh, enjoying the Christmas spirit. At the far end of the bar, a seedy, unshaven man in his late 40s, wearing a Santa costume, sits alone, enjoying two glasses of an entirely different kind of spirit. Santa cuts a lonely figure as he sucks on a cigarette and calls over to the barman, then stares sadly at a group of people drinking a toast. Later, Santa lurches unsteadily up a snow-filled back alley, leans against the wall, and throws up. In a brightly lit shopping mall, a mother and her young children ride up an escalator, and at the top, one of the children stares in wonder at the lavish Santa's grotto that's been constructed. In the grotto, an elf hands a photo of a girl and Santa to her mother, and as the girl goes off, a boy of about eight walks up and sits on Santa's knee. Santa still looks seedy but has at least bothered to put his white beard on, and he shoves the boy away. A little later, Santa wets himself as his little helper wanders over. Santa pulls down his beard and swigs from a bottle of grog, then examines his pants, while his little helper shakes his head despairingly. The security guard says farewell to the last shoppers, and as Santa shuffles off, the guard keys a code into an alarm system. Up in the grotto, three snowmen sit behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib, and the smallest snowman suddenly jumps up, but after a quick look to see the coast is clear, runs off, knocking Mary and Jesus over in the process. The snowman slides down between the escalators as the alarm system continues its arming countdown, crashes into a display at the bottom, and trots up to run through the shop. The snowman pulls the arm off of a mannequin as he goes and uses the arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can arm. The snowman pulls his head off, revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper, and now in regular clothes, Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The illumination shafts from a flashlight held high by a statuesque woman wearing Hellenic style garments, and the emblem dissolves away to black. A few specks of snow gently drift out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights atop an establishment promoting itself as O'Hara's Tavern, while a few individuals meander down the street, clutching gifts for their cherished ones. Inside the tavern, various assemblies of companions, kin, and work associates have convened together for a festive drink and to exchange presents. They converse and laugh, enjoying the Christmas spirit. At the far end of the bar, a shady, unshaven man in his late 40s, wearing a Santa outfit, sits alone, enjoying two glasses of a completely different type of spirit. Santa cuts a solitary figure as he sucks on a cigarette and calls over to the bartender, then stares sadly at a cluster of people drinking a toast. Later, Santa lunges unsteadily up a snow-filled back alley, leans against the wall, and throws up. In a brightly lit shopping center, a mother and her young children ride up an escalator, and at the top, one of the children stares in amazement at the opulent Santa's grotto that's been constructed. In the grotto, an elf hands a photograph of a girl and Santa to her mother, and as the girl goes off, a boy of about eight walks up and sits on Santa's knee. Santa still looks shady but has at least bothered to put his white beard on, and he shoves the boy away. A little later, Santa wets himself as his little helper wanders over. Santa pulls down his beard and gulps from a bottle of grog, then examines his trousers, while his little helper shakes his head despairingly. The security guard says goodbye to the last shoppers, and as Santa shuffles off, the guard keys a code into an alarm mechanism. Up in the grotto, three snowmen sit behind sculptures of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib, and the smallest snowman suddenly jumps up, but after a quick look to see the coast is clear, runs off, knocking Mary and Jesus over in the procedure. The snowman slides down between the escalators as the alarm mechanism continues its arming countdown, crashes into a display at the bottom, and trots up to run through the shop. The snowman pulls the arm off of a mannequin as he goes and uses the arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can arm. The snowman pulls his head off, revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper, and now in regular attire, Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The light is beamed from a torch that is held aloft by a statuesque woman wearing Grecian style robes, and blackness is what the logo fades to. A few flakes of snow are gently fluttered out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights atop an establishment advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub, while gifts for their loved ones are clutched by a few people wandering down the street. The pub is where various groups of friends, families, and work colleagues have gathered together for a festive drink and to exchange presents. Chatting and laughing are enjoyed by them, partaking in the Christmas spirit. At the far end of the bar, a seedy, unshaven man in his late 40s, wearing a Santa costume, is seated alone, enjoying two glasses of an entirely different kind of spirit. A lonely figure is cut by Santa as a cigarette is sucked on and a call is made over to the barman, then he stares sadly at a group of people drinking a toast. Later, an unsteady lurch is made by Santa up a snow-filled back alley, leaning against the wall, and vomiting. In a brightly lit shopping mall, an escalator is ridden up by a mother and her young children, and at the top, the lavish Santa's grotto that's been constructed is stared at in wonder by one of the children. In the grotto, a photo of a girl and Santa is handed to her mother by an elf, and as the girl goes off, a boy of about eight walks up and sits on Santa's knee. Santa, still seedy, has at least bothered to put his white beard on, and the boy is shoved away by him. A little later, Santa wets himself as his little helper wanders over. The beard is pulled down by Santa, and a swig from a bottle of grog is taken, then his pants are examined by him while his little helper shakes his head despairingly. The last shoppers are bid farewell by the security guard, and as Santa shuffles off, a code is keyed by the guard into an alarm system. Up in the grotto, three snowmen are seated behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib, and the smallest snowman suddenly jumps up, but after a quick look to see the coast is clear, he runs off, knocking Mary and Jesus over in the process. The escalators are slid down between by the snowman as the alarm system continues its arming countdown, and he crashes into a display at the bottom, then trots up to run through the shop. The arm off of a mannequin is pulled by the snowman as he goes and reaches up with the arm to switch off the alarm before it can arm. The head of the snowman is pulled off, revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper, and now in regular clothes, Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: The torchlight from a statuesque woman in Grecian robes fades to black. Snowflakes drift past a Christmas Tree atop O'Hara's Pub, where people clutch gifts. Inside, friends and families enjoy festive drinks. A seedy, unshaven man in a Santa costume sits alone, drinking and smoking. Later, he stumbles up a snowy alley and vomits. In a mall, a mother and children ride an escalator to a lavish Santa's grotto. An elf hands a photo to a mother, and a boy sits on Santa's knee. Santa, looking disheveled, shoves the boy away, wets himself, and drinks grog. The security guard bids farewell to shoppers and sets the alarm. In the grotto, a snowman jumps up, knocks over Mary and Jesus, slides down the escalator, crashes into a display, and uses a mannequin arm to disable the alarm. The snowman reveals Santa's sweating helper, who finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Light beams from a torch held by a statuesque woman in Grecian robes, and the logo fades to black. Snowflakes flutter past a Christmas tree atop O'Hara's Pub, where people clutch gifts. Inside, friends and families enjoy festive drinks. A seedy, unshaven man in a Santa costume sits alone, drinking and smoking. Later, he stumbles up a snowy alley and vomits. In a mall, a mother and children ride an escalator to a lavish Santa's grotto. An elf hands a photo to a mother, and a boy sits on Santa's knee. Santa, looking seedy, shoves the boy away. Santa wets himself, drinks grog, and examines his pants while his helper shakes his head. A security guard bids farewell to shoppers and arms the alarm. In the grotto, a snowman jumps up, knocks over Mary and Jesus, slides down, crashes into a display, and uses a mannequin arm to switch off the alarm. The snowman reveals Santa's sweating helper, who, now in regular clothes, finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
The scene begins with the light beams emanating from a torch, which is held high by a statuesque woman adorned in flowing Grecian-style robes. This iconic image gradually fades away into darkness. As the scene transitions, a few delicate flakes of snow gently flutter down from the night sky, passing by a Christmas tree made entirely of twinkling fairy lights. This festive tree is perched atop an establishment proudly advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub. Meanwhile, a handful of people meander down the street, clutching gifts intended for their loved ones. Inside the cozy pub, various groups of friends, families, and work colleagues have gathered together to enjoy a festive drink and exchange presents. They engage in lively conversation and laughter, fully immersed in the joyous Christmas spirit. 

At the far end of the bar, a seedy, unshaven man, appearing to be in his late 40s, sits alone. He is dressed in a Santa costume and is enjoying two glasses of a completely different kind of spirit. This Santa cuts a lonely figure as he takes a drag from a cigarette and calls over to the barman. He then gazes sadly at a group of people who are raising their glasses in a toast. Later on, this Santa is seen lurching unsteadily up a snow-filled back alley. He leans against the wall and proceeds to throw up. 

In a brightly lit shopping mall, a mother and her young children are riding up an escalator. At the top, one of the children gazes in wonder at the lavish Santa's grotto that has been constructed. Inside the grotto, an elf hands a photo of a girl with Santa to her mother. As the girl goes off, a boy, who appears to be about eight years old, approaches and sits on Santa's knee. Although Santa still looks seedy, he has at least made the effort to put on his white beard. He then shoves the boy away. A little later, Santa wets himself as his little helper wanders over. Santa pulls down his beard and takes a swig from a bottle of grog, then examines his pants, while his little helper shakes his head in despair.

As the day comes to a close, the security guard bids farewell to the last shoppers. As Santa shuffles off, the guard keys a code into an alarm system. Up in the grotto, three snowmen are positioned behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib. Suddenly, the smallest snowman jumps up, and after a quick glance to ensure the coast is clear, it runs off, accidentally knocking over Mary and Jesus in the process. The snowman slides down between the escalators as the alarm system continues its countdown to arming. It crashes into a display at the bottom and then trots up to run through the shop. The snowman pulls the arm off a mannequin as it goes and uses the arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can fully arm. The snowman then removes its head, revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper. Now dressed in regular clothes, Santa's little helper opens a back door and discovers Santa, who is surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
The scene begins dramatically, with radiant beams of light emanating from a hand-held torch. This torch is held aloft by a statuesque woman, who is elegantly adorned in flowing, Grecian-style robes, casting an iconic image. Gradually, this memorable image gently fades away into complete darkness. As the scene makes its transition, a few delicate snowflakes begin their gentle descent from the night sky, fluttering down in a graceful manner. They pass by a beautifully decorated Christmas tree, which is made entirely out of twinkling fairy lights. This festive tree is perched atop a well-known establishment, proudly advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub. Meanwhile, a handful of people are seen meandering down the street, each clutching gifts intended for their loved ones. Inside the cozy and inviting pub, various groups of friends, family members, and work colleagues have gathered together with the intention of enjoying festive drinks and exchanging meaningful presents. They engage in lively conversation and laughter, fully immersed and embracing the joyous Christmas spirit that fills the air.

At the far, dimly-lit end of the bar, a seedy, unshaven man, who appears to be in his late 40s, sits all alone. He is dressed in a somewhat ragged Santa costume and is indulging in two glasses, each containing a completely different kind of spirit. This particular Santa cuts a lonely figure as he takes a long drag from a cigarette, then calls over to the barman for assistance. He proceeds to gaze sadly at a group of people who are cheerfully raising their glasses in a celebratory toast. Later on, this same Santa is seen lurching unsteadily up a narrow, snow-filled back alley. He leans heavily against the wall for support and proceeds to throw up.

In the midst of a brightly lit shopping mall, a mother and her young children can be seen riding up an escalator. As they reach the top, one of the children gazes in absolute wonder at the lavish Santa's grotto that has been meticulously constructed. Inside this grotto, an elf hands over a cherished photo of a little girl with Santa to her appreciative mother. As the girl goes off on her own, a boy, who appears to be about eight years old, approaches eagerly and sits on Santa's knee. Although Santa still looks rather seedy, he has at least made an effort to put on his iconic white beard. He then rudely shoves the boy away. A little later, Santa wets himself as his little helper wanders over to him. Santa pulls down his beard carelessly and takes a swig from a bottle of grog. He then examines his pants with disdain, while his little helper shakes his head in despair.

As the day gradually comes to a close, a diligent security guard bids farewell to the last of the shoppers. As Santa slowly shuffles off into the distance, the guard carefully keys a code into the alarm system. Up in the grotto, three snowmen are strategically positioned behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus lying peacefully in his crib. Suddenly, the smallest snowman jumps up, and after a quick glance to ensure that the coast is clear, it dashes off, accidentally knocking over Mary and Jesus in the chaotic process. The snowman slides swiftly down between the escalators as the alarm system continues its countdown to arming. It crashes into a display at the bottom and then trots purposefully up to run through the shop. As the snowman goes by, it pulls the arm off a mannequin and uses this arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can be fully armed. The snowman then carefully removes its head, revealing none other than Santa's profusely sweating little helper. Now, dressed in regular clothes, Santa's little helper opens a back door and discovers Santa, who is surrounded by a sea of empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The scene begins with the light beams emanating from a torch held high by a statuesque woman dressed in Grecian-style robes, casting a glow that gradually fades away into darkness. As the screen turns black, a few delicate flakes of snow begin to gently flutter down from the night sky, passing by a Christmas tree adorned with twinkling fairy lights perched atop a building that proudly displays the name O'Hara's Pub. Meanwhile, a handful of people meander down the street, each clutching gifts intended for their loved ones. Inside the pub, the atmosphere is lively as various groups of friends, families, and work colleagues gather together, each group animatedly chatting and laughing, fully immersed in the festive spirit as they enjoy drinks and exchange presents. At the far end of the bar, a solitary figure, a seedy, unshaven man in his late 40s dressed in a Santa costume, sits alone. He is absorbed in his own world, savoring two glasses of a different kind of spirit, while he cuts a lonely figure, sucking on a cigarette. He calls over to the barman, his voice tinged with melancholy, and then turns his gaze towards a group of people who are joyfully drinking a toast, his expression filled with sadness. As time passes, Santa is seen lurching unsteadily up a snow-filled back alley, where he pauses to lean against the wall before succumbing to nausea and throwing up. The scene shifts to a brightly lit shopping mall, where a mother and her young children are riding up an escalator. At the top, one of the children gazes in awe at the lavish Santa's grotto that has been meticulously constructed. Inside the grotto, an elf hands a photo of a girl with Santa to her mother, and as the girl departs, a boy of about eight approaches and sits on Santa's knee. Although Santa still appears seedy, he has at least made the effort to wear his white beard. However, he brusquely shoves the boy away. A little later, Santa, now visibly distressed, wets himself as his little helper approaches. Santa pulls down his beard, takes a swig from a bottle of grog, and inspects his pants, while his little helper looks on, shaking his head in despair. As the day draws to a close, the security guard bids farewell to the last shoppers, and as Santa shuffles off, the guard keys a code into an alarm system. Up in the grotto, three snowmen are positioned behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib. Suddenly, the smallest snowman jumps up, and after a quick glance to ensure the coast is clear, he makes a run for it, inadvertently knocking over Mary and Jesus in the process. The snowman slides down between the escalators, and as the alarm system continues its countdown to arm, he crashes into a display at the bottom and quickly trots up to run through the shop. In a swift motion, the snowman pulls the arm off a mannequin as he passes by and uses it to reach up and switch off the alarm just in time. With the alarm disarmed, the snowman removes his head, revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper underneath. Now dressed in regular clothes, Santa's little helper opens a back door and discovers Santa, surrounded by a sea of empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: The logo fades to black after a torch-bearing woman in Grecian robes is shown. Snowflakes drift past a Christmas tree made of fairy lights atop O'Hara's Pub, where people stroll by with gifts. Inside, groups of friends, families, and colleagues enjoy festive drinks and laughter. At the bar's end, a seedy, unshaven man in a Santa costume drinks alone, smoking and watching others toast. Later, he stumbles through a snowy alley and vomits. In a shopping mall, a mother and her children ride an escalator, and a child marvels at a lavish Santa's grotto. An elf hands a photo to a mother, and a boy sits on Santa's knee, who, looking disheveled, pushes him away. Santa wets himself, drinks from a bottle, and examines his pants as his helper looks on in dismay. As the security guard bids farewell to shoppers and sets the alarm, a snowman in the grotto jumps up, knocks over Mary and Jesus, and slides down the escalator, crashing into a display. The snowman uses a mannequin arm to disable the alarm, revealing Santa's sweating helper inside. Now in regular clothes, the helper opens a back door to find Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The light beams from a torch held aloft by a statuesque woman wearing Grecian style robes, symbolizing liberty and enlightenment, and the logo fades away to black. A few flakes of snow gently flutter out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights, similar to those traditionally used in many Western holiday decorations, atop an establishment advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub, a popular local spot known for its welcoming atmosphere, while a few people wander down the street, clutching gifts wrapped in colorful paper for their loved ones. Inside the pub, various groups of friends, families, and work colleagues have gathered together for a festive drink during the holiday season and to exchange presents. They chat and laugh, enjoying the Christmas spirit that's enhanced by the pub's warm, inviting decor. At the far end of the bar, a seedy, unshaven man in his late 40s, wearing a Santa costume that looks like it's seen better days, sits alone, enjoying two glasses of an entirely different kind of spirit, a reference to alcoholic beverages. Santa cuts a lonely figure as he sucks on a cigarette, despite widespread smoking bans in many public places, and calls over to the barman, then stares sadly at a group of people drinking a toast, a traditional gesture of goodwill. Later, Santa lurches unsteadily up a snow-filled back alley, typical of the narrow passageways found in older neighborhoods, leans against the wall, and throws up, possibly from excessive drinking. In a brightly lit shopping mall, a modern retail complex catering to busy holiday shoppers, a mother and her young children ride up an escalator, and at the top, one of the children stares in wonder at the lavish Santa's grotto that's been constructed, a seasonal attraction meant to entertain children. In the grotto, an elf, dressed in festive attire, hands a photo of a girl and Santa to her mother, and as the girl goes off, a boy of about eight walks up and sits on Santa's knee, a customary part of holiday tradition. Santa still looks seedy but has at least bothered to put his white beard on, part of the iconic image of the character, and he shoves the boy away, displaying a lack of the usual jolly demeanor. A little later, Santa wets himself, an indication of his disheveled state, as his little helper dressed in an elf costume wanders over. Santa pulls down his beard and swigs from a bottle of grog, a slang term for an alcoholic drink, then examines his pants, while his little helper shakes his head despairingly, perhaps aware of the consequences. The security guard, employed to maintain order, says farewell to the last shoppers, and as Santa shuffles off, the guard keys a code into an alarm system, a standard security measure. Up in the grotto, three snowmen sit behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib, part of a nativity scene, and the smallest snowman suddenly jumps up, but after a quick look to see the coast is clear, runs off, knocking Mary and Jesus over in the process, causing an unintended disturbance. The snowman slides down between the escalators as the alarm system continues its arming countdown, crashes into a display at the bottom, and trots up to run through the shop, likely causing chaos. The snowman pulls the arm off of a mannequin, often used for displaying clothing, as he goes and uses the arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can arm, preventing the security measure from activating. The snowman pulls his head off, revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper, now in regular clothes, which disguise his earlier role, Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans, evidence of his prolonged drinking spree.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: The light beams from a torch held aloft by a statuesque woman wearing Grecian style robes and the logo fades away to black. A few flakes of snow gently flutter out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights atop an establishment advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub while a few people wander down the street clutching gifts for their loved ones. Inside the pub various groups of friends families and work colleagues have gathered together for a festive drink and to exchange presents. They chat and laugh enjoying the Christmas spirit. At the far end of the bar a seedy unshaven man in his late 40s wearing a Santa costume sits alone enjoying two glasses of an entirely different kind of spirit. Santa cuts a lonely figure as he sucks on a cigarette and calls over to the barman then stares sadly at a group of people drinking a toast. Later Santa lurches unsteadily up a snowfilled back alley leans against the wall and throws up. In a brightly lit shopping mall a mother and her young children ride up an escalator and at the top one of the children stares in wonder at the lavish Santa's grotto that is been constructed. In the grotto an elf hands a photo of a girl and Santa to her mother and as the girl goes off a boy of about eight walks up and sits on Santa's knee. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. Santa still looks seedy but has at least bothered to put his white beard on and he shoves the boy away. A little later Santa wets himself as his little helper wanders over. Santa pulls down his beard and swigs from a bottle of grog then examines his pants while his little helper shakes his head despairingly. The security guard says farewell to the last shoppers and as Santa shuffles off the guard keys a code into an alarm system. Up in the grotto three snowmen sit behind statues of Mary and the baby Jesus in his crib and the smallest snowman suddenly jumps up but after a quick look to see the coast is clear runs off knocking Mary and Jesus over in the process. The snowman slides down between the escalators as the alarm system continues its arming countdown crashes into a display at the bottom and trots up to run through the shop. The snowman pulls the arm off of a mannequin as he goes and uses the arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can arm. The snowman pulls his head off revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper and now in regular clothes. Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

A few flakes of snow gently flutter out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights atop an establishment advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub while a few people wander down the street clutching gifts for their loved ones. Inside the pub various groups of friends families and work colleagues have gathered together for a festive drink and to exchange presents. They chat and laugh enjoying the Christmas spirit. At the far end of the bar a seedy unshaven man in his late 40s wearing a Santa costume sits alone enjoying two glasses of an entirely different kind of spirit. The snowman slides down between the escalators as the alarm system continues its arming countdown crashes into a display at the bottom and trots up to run through the shop. The snowman pulls the arm off of a mannequin as he goes and uses the arm to reach up and switch off the alarm before it can arm. The snowman pulls his head off revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper and now in regular clothes. Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: The light beams from a torch held aloft by a statuesque woman wearing Grecian style robes and the logo fades away to black. A few flakes of snow gently flutter out of a night sky past a Christmas Tree made of fairy lights atop an establishment advertising itself as O'Hara's Pub while a few people wander down the street clutching gifts for their loved ones. The snowman pulls his head off revealing Santa's profusely sweating little helper and now in regular clothes. Santa's little helper opens a back door and finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The glow emanates from a flashlight gripped tightly by a towering man dressed in medieval attire, and the emblem dissolves into white. A few grains of sand lazily drift down from a midday sun above a lighthouse decorated with holiday baubles atop a building promoting itself as Johnson's Cafe, as a couple of cats stroll up the hill, dragging food for their offspring. Outside the cafe, random collections of strangers, rivals, and artists have congregated for a celebratory meal and to distribute cookies. They argue and whisper, absorbing the holiday gloom. At the near side of the counter, a cheerful, clean-shaven boy in his early 20s, wearing a pirate outfit, stands together, relishing three bowls of a completely unrelated type of drink. The pirate cuts a cheerful presence as he munches on a donut and waves over to the janitor, then glances joyfully at a bunch of dogs sharing a secret. Earlier, the pirate glides gracefully through a rain-soaked front hallway, leans on a bench, and falls asleep. In a dimly lit gymnasium, a father and his teenage twins float down a staircase, and at the bottom, one of the twins yells in fear at the modest bear's cave that's been deconstructed. In the cave, a troll tosses a picture of a boy and the pirate to his father, and while the boy wanders off, a girl of about five runs over and stands on the pirate's feet. The pirate still looks cheerful but has at least attempted to put his black wig on, and he nudges the girl away. Soon after, the pirate hugs a pillow as his giant assistant twirls around. The pirate pulls up his hat and sips from a jug of juice, then scrutinizes his shoes, while his giant assistant nods approvingly. The librarian greets the first visitors, and as the pirate sprints off, the librarian punches a code into a safe. Down at the cave, three penguins sit in front of statues of Joseph and the infant Mary in her crib, and the largest penguin unexpectedly sits down, but after a quick peek to ensure the path is busy, strolls off, tipping Joseph and Mary in the endeavor. The penguin climbs up next to the staircases as the safe continues its closing countdown, collides with a billboard at the top, and gallops away to stroll through the cafe. The penguin pulls the tail off a stuffed animal as he leaves and utilizes the tail to stretch down and deactivate the safe before it can close. The penguin removes his foot, revealing the pirate's meek assistant drenched in cold water, and now in formal attire, the pirate's meek assistant exits through a side entrance and locates the pirate encircled by full candy jars.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: A torch held by a woman in Grecian robes fades to black, revealing snowflakes falling past a fairy-lit Christmas tree at O'Hara's Pub. Inside, groups enjoy festive drinks, while a lonely man dressed as Santa drinks alone, smoking and watching others toast. Later, he stumbles through a snow-filled alley, vomiting. In a mall, a mother and children ascend an escalator, marveling at Santa's grotto. There, a seedy Santa interacts with children, swigs grog, and wets himself, to his helper's despair. After the mall closes, three snowmen are seen behind Nativity statues. One snowman jumps up, knocking over Mary and Jesus, then deactivates an alarm using a mannequin arm. The snowman reveals himself as Santa's helper, who finds Santa surrounded by empty beer cans.
